6655h, 4686m, 30595e, 21681w xdb-
A bustling farrier's yard.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A small wooden lottery box stands here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A small grey-brown rattlesnake is coiled here, rattling menacingly. Restlessly eyeing the surroundings is a golden desert drake. In threat of being stepped upon, a diminutive tortoise cautiously rests here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A metal bucket is here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. There are 5 guardian angels here. Serenie, a little snow-white dove, lingers here with curiosity and joy. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. A fiery efreeti spins madly here. A moonstone-scaled asp rests coiled in contemplation. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings.  Deacon of Celestia Bahtell Muk'tar, Aarashi Rasul stands here, content with the world. He wields an Auroran Mace in his left hand. Devout Nila Sunchaser stands here, content with the world. Predicant Kaiu Silvertongue-Obuun is here. She wields an Yggdrasian splinter in both hands. Lachlan Del-Amroth, Aarashi Rasul is here, calm and relaxed. Her face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. She wields a sharp, brazen spear with billowing neck ribbons in her right hand. Soldier Shiro is here. Oathsworn Shros is riding on an alabaster pegasus. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Chimery is here. She wields a spiritual mace in her right hand. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is riding on a heavy horse. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Banek, of Targossas is here. He wields a steel Theran broadsword in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is riding on a luminous ivory jaguar. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Essandri, of Targossas is here, serene. She wields a steel shortsword in each hand. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. Soldier Ada Young is here. Predicant Araeus Sunchaser is here, a determined glint in his eyes. He wields a kite shield in his left hand.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

6655h, 4686m, 27625e, 20200w edb-
There is currently a City credit sale in progress.
----[ Targossas City announcement ]----
The focus for the time-being is solely on eradicating all traces of the visible influence of the Skylord. All attention should be given over to defiling His shrines. Time wasted on defiling shrines to Sartan, Ourania, Babel and Twilight only gives Vastar's Order the opportunity to rebuild. We shall continue our work in stamping out what feeble efforts the rest of our enemies put forth when we are finished with Vastar.
---------------------------------------

On the clouds (indoors).

On the clouds (indoors).
A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Misshapen and desiccated, the shrunken head of Deladan lolls about here. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Warlord Jhui Ta'sa, Lord of the Crossing is here, sprawled on the floor.

On the clouds (indoors).
A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Misshapen and desiccated, the shrunken head of Deladan lolls about here. A statue of sparkling gold stands here, exhibiting Dragonknight's final moments. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Fluffy orange fur litters the ground near the corpse of a tiger cub. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance.  Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. A bustling farrier's yard.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A small wooden lottery box stands here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A small grey-brown rattlesnake is coiled here, rattling menacingly. Restlessly eyeing the surroundings is a golden desert drake. In threat of being stepped upon, a diminutive tortoise cautiously rests here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A metal bucket is here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Serenie, a little snow-white dove, lingers here with curiosity and joy. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. There are 3 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here.  Deacon of Celestia Bahtell Muk'tar, Aarashi Rasul stands here, content with the world. He wields an Auroran Mace in his left hand. Predicant Kaiu Silvertongue-Obuun is here. She wields an Yggdrasian splinter in both hands. Oathsworn Shros is riding on an alabaster pegasus. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is riding on a heavy horse. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Shiro is here. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. Agustin, Zaikousei of the Hold is here. He wields a kite shield in his left hand and a spiritual mace in his right. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Soldier Ada Young is here. Banek, of Targossas is here. He wields a steel Theran broadsword in each hand. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Asuu is here, calm and relaxed.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A small wooden lottery box stands here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A small grey-brown rattlesnake is coiled here, rattling menacingly. Restlessly eyeing the surroundings is a golden desert drake. In threat of being stepped upon, a diminutive tortoise cautiously rests here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A metal bucket is here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Serenie, a little snow-white dove, lingers here with curiosity and joy. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. Gateway to Targossas.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 2 Blackstone swordsmen here. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. Resplendent rays of white and gold suffuse the smooth contours of a slender glass pillar, a fervent symbol of Light's resolve. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus.  Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right.
You see exits leading north and south.

The Champions' Bridge.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Hung from the western column of the arch that forms the city gates, a gilt-edged indigo scroll proudly displays the Bloodsworn decree on innocence. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. There are 2 Blackstone swordsmen here. A noble snow-white falcon glides to and fro here. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A moonstone-scaled asp rests coiled in contemplation. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings.  A huge statue of the Scimitar of Yen-Sorte stands here, thrusting skywards. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Oathsworn Shros is riding on an alabaster pegasus. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is riding on a luminous ivory jaguar. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Soldier Shiro is here. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is riding on a heavy horse. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Soldier Qara Del-Amroth Rian is here. Soldier Ada Young is here. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. Blackstone military quarter.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A dense mist of silver ripples in the air around the immense form of Ilona'neron, the Colossus. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, south, west, and northwest.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A small wooden lottery box stands here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small grey-brown rattlesnake is coiled here, rattling menacingly. Restlessly eyeing the surroundings is a golden desert drake. In threat of being stepped upon, a diminutive tortoise cautiously rests here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A metal bucket is here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Serenie, a little snow-white dove, lingers here with curiosity and joy. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. There are 2 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground.  Deacon of Celestia Bahtell Muk'tar, Aarashi Rasul stands here, content with the world. He wields an Auroran Mace in his left hand. Banek, of Targossas is here. He wields a steel Theran broadsword in each hand. Predicant Kaiu Silvertongue-Obuun is here. She wields an Yggdrasian splinter in both hands. Kei Greywards is here. She wields an ornate steel rapier in her left hand and a bard's flute in her right. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

Fields of indigo.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. An obsidian eye sigil is here. Pale violet flowers bloom upon a bushy indigo plant. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Lachlan Del-Amroth, Aarashi Rasul is here, calm and relaxed. Her face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. She wields a sharp, brazen spear with billowing neck ribbons in her right hand. Oathsworn Shros is riding on an alabaster pegasus. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is riding on a heavy horse. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right. Soldier Qara Del-Amroth Rian is here. Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is riding on a luminous ivory jaguar. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. Soldier Shiro is here. Soldier Ada Young is here.
You see exits leading north, east, west, and northwest.

Crossroads near Targossas (road).
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. An obsidian eye sigil is here. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Lachlan Del-Amroth, Aarashi Rasul is here, calm and relaxed. Her face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. She wields a sharp, brazen spear with billowing neck ribbons in her right hand. Oathsworn Shros is riding on an alabaster pegasus. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. He wields Ancient Crowns in his left hand. Kei Greywards is here. She wields an ornate steel rapier in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. Terra a'Bertal is here. She wields an elemental staff in her left hand and an ornate steel rapier in her right. Soldier Ada Young is here. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right. Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is riding on a luminous ivory jaguar. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Soldier Shiro is here. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The soul of Kross roams the land, bodiless. Soldier Qara Del-Amroth Rian is here. The soul of Gyrth roams the land, bodiless. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is riding on a heavy horse. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.
You see exits leading north, east, south, and west.

On the clouds (indoors).
A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Misshapen and desiccated, the shrunken head of Deladan lolls about here. A statue of sparkling gold stands here, exhibiting Dragonknight's final moments. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Oathsworn Shros is riding on an alabaster pegasus. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Terra a'Bertal is here. She wields an elemental staff in her left hand and an ornate steel rapier in her right. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is riding on a heavy horse. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Kei Greywards is here. She wields an ornate steel rapier in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. Lachlan Del-Amroth, Aarashi Rasul is here, calm and relaxed. Her face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. She wields a sharp, brazen spear with billowing neck ribbons in her right hand. Soldier Shiro is here. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Soldier Ada Young is here. Soldier Qara Del-Amroth Rian is here. Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is riding on a luminous ivory jaguar. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right.

On the clouds (indoors).
A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Misshapen and desiccated, the shrunken head of Deladan lolls about here. A statue of sparkling gold stands here, exhibiting Dragonknight's final moments. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. There is a small group of sprigs of cactus weed here. There are 5 pieces of irid moss in 5 groups here. There are 5 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. There are 43 aurum flakes in 43 groups here. There are 2 argentum flakes in 2 groups here. A glimmering mote of azurite lies partially buried within the ground. A grain of crystalline dolomite rests on the ground here. A purple crystal of calamine is here. There are 6 bloodroot leaves in 4 groups here. A beautifully rendered tarot card inscribed with Lust has been discarded. There are 2 skullcap flowers in 2 groups here.  Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. He is surrounded by a glowing white nimbus.

Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. There are 6 pinches of ground cinnabar in 6 groups here. There are 10 plumbum flakes in 10 groups here. There are 3 pinches of ground realgar in 3 groups here. There are 18 gypsum crystals in 16 groups here. There are 49 potash crystals in 45 groups here. There are 14 pinches of ground malachite in 14 groups here. There are 3 arsenic pellets in 2 groups here. There are 4 quartz grains in 3 groups here. There are 19 magnesium chips in 17 groups here. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. Muscles ripple beneath the shining coat of a black destrier. There are 2 pieces of bayberry bark in 2 groups here. There is a small group of sprigs of cactus weed here. There are 5 pieces of irid moss in 5 groups here. There are 5 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. There are 43 aurum flakes in 43 groups here. There are 2 argentum flakes in 2 groups here. A glimmering mote of azurite lies partially buried within the ground. A grain of crystalline dolomite rests on the ground here. A purple crystal of calamine is here. There are 6 bloodroot leaves in 4 groups here. A beautifully rendered tarot card inscribed with Lust has been discarded. There are 2 skullcap flowers in 2 groups here.  The soul of Nemutaur roams the land, bodiless. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. He is surrounded by a glowing white nimbus.
 Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Qara Del-Amroth Rian is here. Soldier Shiro is here. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right. Dajio is here, shrouded. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an iron-tipped whip in his left hand and a needle-pointed dirk in his right. Soldier Ada Young is here. Kei Greywards is here. She wields an ornate steel rapier in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. Terra a'Bertal is here. She wields an elemental staff in her left hand and an ornate steel rapier in her right. Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is here. Above the clouds over northwestern Sapience (indoors).
Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes.  Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Oathsworn Shros is riding on an alabaster pegasus. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The soul of Jhui roams the land, bodiless. Kei Greywards is here. She wields an ornate steel rapier in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. Soldier Ada Young is here. Terra a'Bertal is here. She wields an elemental staff in her left hand and an ornate steel rapier in her right. Soldier Shiro is here. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is here. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Soldier Qara Del-Amroth Rian is here. Dajio is here, shrouded. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an iron-tipped whip in his left hand and a needle-pointed dirk in his right.

On the clouds (indoors).
A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Misshapen and desiccated, the shrunken head of Deladan lolls about here. A statue of sparkling gold stands here, exhibiting Dragonknight's final moments. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. Muscles ripple beneath the shining coat of a black destrier. There are 2 pieces of bayberry bark in 2 groups here. There is a small group of sprigs of cactus weed here. There are 5 pieces of irid moss in 5 groups here. There are 5 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. There are 6 bloodroot leaves in 4 groups here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Soldier Shiro is here. Oathsworn Shros is riding on an alabaster pegasus. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Soldier Ada Young is here. Terra a'Bertal is here. She wields an elemental staff in her left hand and an ornate steel rapier in her right. Kei Greywards is here. She wields an ornate steel rapier in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A small wooden lottery box stands here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A small grey-brown rattlesnake is coiled here, rattling menacingly. Restlessly eyeing the surroundings is a golden desert drake. In threat of being stepped upon, a diminutive tortoise cautiously rests here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A metal bucket is here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Serenie, a little snow-white dove, lingers here with curiosity and joy. There are 4 guardian angels here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings.  Deacon of Celestia Bahtell Muk'tar, Aarashi Rasul stands here, content with the world. He wields an Auroran Mace in his left hand. Soldier Shiro is here. Predicant Kaiu Silvertongue-Obuun is here. She wields an Yggdrasian splinter in both hands. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Kei Greywards is here. She wields an ornate steel rapier in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is here. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Soldier Qara Del-Amroth Rian is here. Soldier Ada Young is here. Chimery is here. She wields a spiritual mace in her right hand. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Oathsworn Shros is riding on an alabaster pegasus. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Terra a'Bertal is here. She wields an elemental staff in her left hand and an ornate steel rapier in her right. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Soldier Iskla Rian is here.

PUBLIC NEWS #19435                                      (04/30/2014 at 17:16)  
From   : Cyrenian Rogue Faustine Anemides
To     : Vastar, the Skylord
Subject: Freedom, History, and Hard Decisions
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I was there to see Your return, Lord Vastar. I was happy to see a God come back to us; in this day and age we can use all the divine help we can get. But I reserved judgement, at first, afraid to be disappointed. Perhaps I should have held out a bit longer.

You see, I did learn a lesson from the Worldreaver fiasco. I learned that the gods are as fallible as we mortals. I learned that They often can't see past Their own hubris and power. Truthfully, on the day my Lady Selene fell, I swore that I would no longer bow before the questionable wisdom of the Gods. Power has never impressed me. Power is unworthy of worship. Only wisdom, foresight, and intellect can claim that from me.

So why did I reverse my oath for You, Lord?

I looked into Your history. I read records of Your interactions with Your followers. I was impressed. I found You to be a god with a level head and a philosophy I could agree with. You warned about the dangers of zealotry in Shallam-that-was, but similarly spoke out against the Chaos that was practiced in Ashtan. You stood above the politics of Mortals and for that, I loved You.

Now I do not know what to think.

I awoke this month after a year long absence to discover that I had been enemied to several Targossian organizations. At first I believed it to be Targossas' inflexible policies; that they had condemned You and Yours exclusively due to Your association with Ashtan. Upon reading the news, I find myself in an unprecedented situation: I agree with something Silas has posted on the News. It is sad to see You so corrupted.

Oh, and I learned one other thing from watching half the pantheon slain while you watched from afar: The Goddess of the Sun was slain but morning still comes every day; my Goddess, who bore the mantle of Love and Beauty, died in heroic self-sacrifice and yet people still are stricken by beauty and fall desperately in love. The gods who fell in the Worldreaver fiasco are dead, Their essence scattered. They do not live on in some fashion. They do not watch over their realms from afar. But the sun still shines, and we still love. And Freedom is not Yours to take. It is, with, or without, You to define it.


Forever Hers,

Beloved Faustine Anemides

Post Script, addressed to Sapience at Large: I am certain there will be those who will read this as an attempt to curry favour with Targossas and who will claim that I am simply another Cyrenese puppet of the East. Allow me to set the record straight. As laughable as it is that a little old nobody like me is branded an Enemy of Creation, I don't care what the Dawnspear says or thinks of me. Either clear me of charges or not. It makes little difference to me.

Penned by my hand on the 13th of Lupar, in the year 653 AF.

PUBLIC NEWS #19436                                      (05/01/2014 at 00:39)  
From   : Polymathist Achimrst, Minister of Development
To     : Everyone
Subject: Spirits of the Multiverse
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I would like to thank Faustine Anemides for her enlightening words and for reminding me of the lessons of the Spirits of the Multiverse. As Faustine has so eloquently stated, the divine are but one definite aspect of their realm. Without them, the realm continues on through the guidance of the Spirits of that realm.

Unlike divine the spirits do not ask for power, in the form of essence, they simply be and when you die the Endbringer will feed them your soul. Your husk is but a shell, your soul is the food of the multiverse, and your spirit will eventually join others within the spirit realm. This is the truth of the Multiverse. The Supreme Creatrix of the Multiverse now sits tending to the flame of creation. Revile the gods as you must, fight among yourselves as you must to create your balance. Yet calling the Divine corrupt is a perversion of their true nature as all gods will eventually fall into slumber or enter the outer planes. While the Spirits of the Multiverse will always be empowered and empower us.

Wrought as a pentacle upon the hand of the Supreme Creatrix, we will all thrive among the spirits of the Multiverse. May their spirits guide you all.

Polymathist Achimrst
Minister of Development in Eleusis
Disciple of the Elements of the Sylvanic Fellowship
Oracle of the clan Curia Spiritus


Penned by my hand on the 21st of Lupar, in the year 653 AF.

ANNOUNCE NEWS #4120                                     (05/01/2014 at 01:26)  
From   : Tecton, the Terraformer
To     : Everyone
Subject: Classlead Changes - Pt. 1
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We're pleased to announce the first batch of changes stemming from our most recent CLASSLEAD season. Stay tuned for many more to come, as we work through the amazing amount of feedback you guys offered!

General
-------
* Souls now have the same hasty restrictions as the living when traversing rooms.
* The ADDICTION affliction will now consume both herb and mineral cures.
* MUSHROOM sigils now carry a balance cost for use.
* WITNESS SHRINE now has a reduced balance cost.
* DOUSING (Survival) will now put out firewalls.
* LOOK <person> will fail on ghosted adventurers (if you could not ordinarily see them).
* Durations (positive and negative) have been reduced on the clouded glass lily.
* IMMUNITY/ANTIGEN now has a cooldown between effective uses.

Apostasy
--------
* ENVENOM has been added.

Chivalry
--------
* RAZESLASH now accepts a venom argument for envenoming.

Crystalism
----------
* Cataclysm now only requires two magi (down from three).
[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (27% shown)]

[File continued via MORE]

Curses
------
* CURSE mana costs have been slightly reduced.

Devotion
--------
* RITES will no longer consume devotion if that rite is present in the room.
* HELLSIGHT now delivers slickness as its first affliction.
* CHAOSCALM will now hit the first unpacified entity in the room.

Domination
----------
* NIN'KHARSAG's effect will now have a third person message when it fades.
* ISTRIA will now show its pathfinder location when touched.

Dragoncraft
-----------
* Targeted DRAGONCURSE now has a reduced mana and willpower cost.
* DRAGONHEAL now has a longer cooldown between uses.

Elementalism
------------
* HAILSTORM will no longer consume mana and willpower if a hailstorm is active in the room.
* SANDLING can no longer be cast while prone.
* SANDLING now works with one broken arm.
* LACERATE's effects are now more pronounced.
* STAVES have a greater effective life.

Harmonics
[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (44% shown)]

[File continued via MORE]
---------
* CONTROL will allow you to dismiss another adventurer's harmonics at a hefty cost.

Hypnosis
--------
* SNAP is no longer forceable.
* Efficacy of low-level hypnotists has been improved.

Kaido
-----
* NUMB now has a cooldown before it can be used again after it expires.

Metamorphosis
-------------
* BIND (Hydra morph) has shorter third head balance.
* STING (Hydra morph) has a shorter third head balance.
* INCINERATE will now bypass reflections when it would normally kill an adventurer.
* POUND on frozen adventurers will now instantly kill them.
* POUND is no longer blocked by the Shield of Absorption.
* IGNITE has been moved to be Druid-specific.
* TRUMPET will now only stun prone adventurers.

Necromancy
----------
* SOULSPEARs will now show the victim who threw them.
* TRAVERSE now has a reduced channel time.
* GRAVEHANDS will now decay slightly slower when the necromancer is out of the room.
* PUTREFACTION has had its health draining effect removed.

Syntax:            PUPPET STATUS
                   
Extra Information: Fashions:
                   Requires: 15
                   Uses: 0

Works on/against:  Adventurers
Details:
Through your puppet, you may see the health and mana of your target. If your puppet is above 30 fashions this skill requires nothing to use.

Blackstone military quarter.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A dense mist of silver ripples in the air around the immense form of Ilona'neron, the Colossus. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A small wooden lottery box stands here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A small grey-brown rattlesnake is coiled here, rattling menacingly. Restlessly eyeing the surroundings is a golden desert drake. In threat of being stepped upon, a diminutive tortoise cautiously rests here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A metal bucket is here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Serenie, a little snow-white dove, lingers here with curiosity and joy. There are 3 guardian angels here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings.  Chimery is here. She wields a spiritual mace in her right hand. Kei Greywards is here. Soldier Shiro is here. Predicant Kaiu Silvertongue-Obuun is here. She wields an Yggdrasian splinter in both hands. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is here. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Oathsworn Shros is riding on an alabaster pegasus. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Ada Young is here. Soldier Qara Del-Amroth Rian is here. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right. Terra a'Bertal is here. She wields an elemental staff in her left hand and an ornate steel rapier in her right. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Banek, of Targossas is here. He wields a steel Theran broadsword in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A small wooden lottery box stands here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small grey-brown rattlesnake is coiled here, rattling menacingly. Restlessly eyeing the surroundings is a golden desert drake. In threat of being stepped upon, a diminutive tortoise cautiously rests here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A metal bucket is here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Serenie, a little snow-white dove, lingers here with curiosity and joy. There are 3 guardian angels here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings.  Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is here. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Soldier Shiro is here. Terra a'Bertal is here. She wields an elemental staff in her left hand and an ornate steel rapier in her right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. Kei Greywards is here. Banek, of Targossas is here. He wields a steel Theran broadsword in each hand. Soldier Qara Del-Amroth Rian is here. Chimery is here. She wields a spiritual mace in her right hand. Soldier Ada Young is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Predicant Kaiu Silvertongue-Obuun is here. She wields an Yggdrasian splinter in both hands. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right.

6032h, 4431m, 27625e, 20055w cexkdb-
The radiant sun shines all about you.
6032h, 4431m, 27625e, 20067w cexkdb-
You cease holding your breath and exhale loudly.
A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A small wooden lottery box stands here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small grey-brown rattlesnake is coiled here, rattling menacingly. Restlessly eyeing the surroundings is a golden desert drake. In threat of being stepped upon, a diminutive tortoise cautiously rests here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A metal bucket is here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Serenie, a little snow-white dove, lingers here with curiosity and joy. There are 3 guardian angels here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Illideus. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings.  Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is here. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Illideus is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an orcish flail marred with char marks in his left hand and a cavalry shield in his right. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Soldier Shiro is here. Terra a'Bertal is here. She wields an elemental staff in her left hand and an ornate steel rapier in her right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. Kei Greywards is here. Soldier Ada Young is here. Predicant Kaiu Silvertongue-Obuun is here. She wields an Yggdrasian splinter in both hands. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Banek, of Targossas is here. He wields a steel Theran broadsword in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Soldier Qara Del-Amroth Rian is here. Chimery is here. She wields a spiritual mace in her right hand. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Soldier Iskla Rian is here.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

Blackstone military quarter.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A dense mist of silver ripples in the air around the immense form of Ilona'neron, the Colossus. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A moonstone-scaled asp rests coiled in contemplation.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.

You have the following defences:
You have accepted a blessing for aid in times of need.
You are walking with the grace of the stars.
Your senses are magically heightened.
You are attempting to pluck arrows from the air.
You are feeling extremely energetic.
You possess the sight of the third eye.
You are surrounded by a cloak of protection.
Your mind is racing with enhanced speed.
You are tempered against fire damage.
Your mind has been touched by Thoth, the Deathgod.
Your resistance to damage by poison has been increased.
You are walking on a small cushion of air.
Your senses are attuned to nearby movement.
You are protected from the fangs of serpents.
Your sense of time is heightened, and your reactions are speeded.
A curseward has been established about your person.
You are looking a little shady today.
You are coated in an insulating unguent.
You are protected from hand-held weapons with an aura of rebounding.
You are blind.
You are deaf.
You have insomnia, and cannot easily go to sleep.
You are extremely heavy and difficult to move.
You will attempt to parry attacks to your left arm.
You are protected by 24 defences.

The Gates of the Gauntlet.

Nieelensars (female Rajamala).
She is 211 years old, having been born on the 6th of Ero, 442 years after the fall of the Seleucarian Empire.
She is ranked 244th in Achaea.
She is an extremely credible character.
She is not known for acts of infamy.
She is considered to be approximately 90% of your might.
She is a mentor and able to take on proteges.
Her motto: 'Take what you will from what you've lost.'
She has taken the hand of Teldrim Kio'Gema, Merchant of the Collective in marriage.
She has been divorced 2 times.
See HONOURS DEEDS NIEELENSARS to view her 5 special honours.

6032h, 4473m, 27625e, 20200w cexkdb-
You inhale deeply and begin holding your breath.
6032h, 4473m, 27625e, 20200w cexkdb-
You cease holding your breath and exhale loudly.
You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
Katlin follows you northwest.
On the clouds (indoors).
A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Misshapen and desiccated, the shrunken head of Deladan lolls about here. A statue of sparkling gold stands here, exhibiting Dragonknight's final moments. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. Muscles ripple beneath the shining coat of a black destrier. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Jhui. A black mamba slithers here.  Warlord Jhui Ta'sa, Lord of the Crossing is riding on a giant eagle. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Misshapen and desiccated, the shrunken head of Deladan lolls about here. A statue of sparkling gold stands here, exhibiting Dragonknight's final moments. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. Muscles ripple beneath the shining coat of a black destrier. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Jhui. A black mamba slithers here. A spinning pentagon carved from a cloudy white crystal floats here. A small spinning crystal pyramid floats nearby. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground.  Katlin is here. She wields a cavalry shield in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. On the clouds (indoors).
A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Misshapen and desiccated, the shrunken head of Deladan lolls about here. A statue of sparkling gold stands here, exhibiting Dragonknight's final moments. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. Muscles ripple beneath the shining coat of a black destrier. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Jhui. A black mamba slithers here. A spinning pentagon carved from a cloudy white crystal floats here. A small spinning crystal pyramid floats nearby. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground.  Katlin is here. She wields a cavalry shield in each hand. Warlord Jhui Ta'sa, Lord of the Crossing is riding on a giant eagle. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

6032h, 4457m, 27625e, 20196w cexkdb-
Jhui glowers at Mithridates with a look of repressed disgust before making a slight gesture toward him.
With the hint of a smile at his lips, Jhui stares intently at Mithridates. Soon, a look of combined shock and pain takes his features as an aureate light begins emanating from his body. Still holding Mithridates in his gaze, Jhui furrows his brow in exertion, completing the transmution as Mithridates's flesh turns into gleaming gold.
Mithridates has been slain by Jhui.

On the clouds (indoors).
A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Misshapen and desiccated, the shrunken head of Deladan lolls about here. A statue of sparkling gold stands here, exhibiting Dragonknight's final moments. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. Muscles ripple beneath the shining coat of a black destrier. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. Miniature hands clasped patiently, a diminutive homunculus stands here, its features bearing an uncanny resemblance to Jhui. A black mamba slithers here.
